extract_comments[source]

extract_comments(comments:list, meta:dict)

Function to extract comments from Facebook posts

Args: comments: list of dictionaries. Each comment is a dictionary meta: dictionary that contains meta information from the post

FbScraper(site:str, stop_date:str, num_pages:int=100, timeout:set=(60, 120))

A scraper object that runs the scraping process and stores posts and comments
